response.job_title: Software Engineer | Golang | AWS | Architecture | ELK | Leadership
response.summary:
Based in Bogotá, Colombia, I am a highly motivated software developer who thrives on transforming challenging concepts into reality. With years of experience under my belt, I've had the privilege of contributing to diverse companies, deploying numerous products and solutions, both independently and as part of dynamic teams. My professional journey has allowed me to engage with a broad spectrum of technologies and programming languages, with a strong focus on Go programming language.

My key areas of expertise include programming and optimization of concurrent systems in GoLang, an area where I am particularly adept at enhancing efficiency. My portfolio also boasts an extensive knowledge of cloud services, specifically those provided by AWS, enabling me to drive seamless and efficient cloud operations.

In addition, I possess a deep understanding of monitoring and observability of software systems, which is critical in maintaining high-performing software ecosystems. Adept in software architecture, I have structured and overseen large-scale projects, ensuring they are planned and executed to perfection.

Beyond my technical prowess, I am recognized for my leadership capabilities, particularly in managing technical teams. My approach is rooted in agile methodologies, fostering swift, efficient, and flexible project delivery.

Passionate about my profession, I am committed to continuous learning and improvement, eagerly seeking opportunities to engage with others who can foster my professional growth. At the same time, I believe in using my skills to make a positive impact on the world.

I invite you to explore my profile to learn more about my professional journey and skills. Let's connect to discuss how we can collaborate and create innovative solutions.
response.skills: Go, Amazon Web Services (AWS), Software Architecture, Software Engineer, Team Leadership, Elastic Stack (ELK), Python, Java

company.name: Merqueo
company.description:
En Merqueo estamos construyendo el retail más grande de América Latina brindándole a nuestros usuarios bienestar y excelentes precios. 

En nuestra plataforma ofrecemos más de  2.000 a 10.000 productos, incluyendo frutas y verduras frescas, productos importados, licores, artículos para el hogar, cuidado personal y de más.

En Merqueo trabajamos para construir un futuro en el que la innovación y la tecnología sean las herramientas para mejorar la vida de las personas.

#LetsBuildTheFutureTogether

🇧🇷 Brasil
🇨🇴 Colombia
